message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.COMM, cs.SY, cs.MM

This paper discusses the challenges faced by mobile network operators in refarming their 2G spectrum to LTE while still providing connectivity to low bandwidth M2M devices. This topic falls under the domain of network infrastructure and wireless communication, which are covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. 

The most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) as the paper proposes a solution for providing GSM connectivity within an LTE carrier. 

The second likely category is cs.IT (Information Theory) as the paper discusses the efficient use of spectrum for both LTE and GSM technologies. 

The third likely category is cs.COMM (Communication and Networking) as the paper deals with wireless communication and spectrum management. 

The fourth likely category is cs.SY (Systems and Control) as the paper proposes a system-level solution for managing spectrum resources. 

The fifth likely category is cs.MM (Multimedia) as the paper mentions the use of M2M devices such as smart meters, which can be considered as a type of multimedia device.
